metaDescription: Join the ZapAround community to connect with fellow travelers, share experiences, and discover amazing destinations.
title: Welcome to the ZapAround Community
subtitle: A place where travelers connect, share experiences, and inspire each other's journeys.
comingSoonDescription: We're building an amazing community space where you can connect with fellow travelers, share tips, and plan adventures together.

connect.title: Connect with Travelers
connect.description: Meet like-minded adventurers from around the world

share.title: Share Experiences
share.description: Share your travel stories, tips, and hidden gems

discover.title: Discover Places
discover.description: Find new destinations through community recommendations

events.title: Join Events
events.description: Participate in virtual and local travel meetups

betaAccess: Join our waitlist to get early access when we launch!
